price: ߣߌߡߊ ߓߍ߯ ߘߌ߫ ߘߝߴߊ߬ ߗߋߥߊߟߌ ( ߛߊ߬ߙߊ ) ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߓߊߏ߬ ߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߟߐ߲ߓߊ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَوُفِّيَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wawuffiyat kullu nafsin mā ʿamilat wahuwa aʿlamu bimā yafʿalūna
